snippet: Gerrit Cole won for the first time in nearly a month, and the Pittsburgh Pirates beat visiting San Francisco, 4-3, on Wednesday for their second straight win over the Giants.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Boston Red Sox defeat Cincinnati Reds, 4-3; other MLB scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Gerrit Cole won for the first time in nearly a month, and the Pittsburgh Pirates beat visiting San Francisco, 4-3, on Wednesday for their second straight win over the Giants.

headline.main: Cole Outpitches Lincecum to Lift Pirates Past Giants
headline.print_headline: Eighth-Inning Rally Helps Red Sox Reach .500 Again
